Metadata.title: When Does Rainbow Six Siege Season End? | R6 Live Countdown
Metadata.description: Live countdown to the end of Rainbow Six Siege Operation Tenfold Pursuit (Y10S4). Track the exact season end date and Year 11 Season 1 release time.

Article.title: Season Intelligence & FAQ
Article.completion_desc: Operation Tenfold Pursuit is targeted to conclude on March 3, 2026. This aligns with the strategic roadmap for Year 11 Season 1 deployment.
Article.next_desc: Prepare for immediate transition to Y11S1 server maintenance following the countdown expiration. New tactical assets expected.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.q1: When does the current Rainbow Six Siege season end?
FAQ.a1: Rainbow Six Siege Operation Tenfold Pursuit (Year 10 Season 4) is expected to end on March 3, 2026. The servers typically go offline for maintenance at 9:00 AM ET / 14:00 UTC.
FAQ.q2: What happens when the timer reaches zero?
FAQ.a2: When the countdown ends, the game servers usually enter a maintenance period for approximately 60-90 minutes. After maintenance, the relevant platform update (PC, PlayStation, Xbox) will be available for download.
FAQ.q3: Will I keep my rank next season?
FAQ.a3: No, your visible rank resets with every new season. However, your hidden MMR (Matchmaking Rating) is not fully reset, which helps determine how quickly you can rank up in the new season.
